articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: 6 things that changed for the stock market overnight - Gift Nifty, US corporate earnings to China stimulus plan | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Asian markets traded mostly in the green amid plans of stimulus measures in China, while the US stocks ended higher overnight on strong corporate earnings and robust economic data.
articles.content: The Indian stock market indices, Sensex and Nifty 50, are expected to open higher on Wednesday tracking positive global cues.  The Asian markets traded mostly in the green amid plans of stimulus meas… [+5824 chars]
